original_text: And ye shall be unto me a kingdom of priests, and an holy nation. These are the words which thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel.
korean_text: 너희가 내게 대하여 제사장 나라가 되며 거룩한 백성이 되리라 너는 이 말을 이스라엘 자손에게 전할지니라

sentences.original_text: And ye shall be unto me a kingdom of priests
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 내게 제사장의 왕국이 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: which thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel
